shani Mensing

In the new Mount Holyoke Makerspace sunlight shines through the large floortoceiling windows from the lake outside and pools around alum Shani Mensing  PERIOD Mensings role within the newly constructed space is the Fimble Maker Innovation Lab Coordinator and Technical Specialist  but she was also there from the beginning when the Makerspace was just a small room and a big idea PERIOD
